Dashboard.Name: Sales Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows the sales with respect to its order quantity, sales volume, and country.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Choropleth Map, Grid, Column Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Patient Experience Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard analyzes patient satisfaction trends during hospital visits.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Date Picker, List Box, Pie Chart, Grid, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Hospital Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Using this Hospital Management dashboard, you can monitor the quality of care, operational, and financial activities of your Hospitals. KPI like Average length of stay of a patient directly impact the costs and the workload of your staff. Using the readmission rate KPI, you can track how many patients are coming back. Readmission rates are a token of quality of care provided in your facilities and should remain as low as possible. Average Treatment Costs are important metrics to track as they directly impact your finances. Also, you can monitor the details related to bed occupancy rate, upcoming appointments per doctor, out and in patients count with respect to division, and so on.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Date Picker, Stacked Chart, Pie Chart, Grid, Card, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Supply Chain Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This supply chain performance dashboard helps to effectively track supply chain KPIs related to the efficiency of sales orders processing such as cash to cash cycle time, perfect order date, order status, feedback details, order details, on-time delivery rate, DSO , DIO, DPO, and so on. As the dashboard example says, these KPIs helps the manager to validate their business portfolio and plan for the long-time improvements as well.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Line Chart, Gauge, Bubble Map, Pivot grid

Dashboard.Name: Supply Chain Warehouse Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Warehouse Management dashboard helps inventory management and to analyze the inventory metrics such as movement of goods and cost factors involved to process transactions like shipping, picking, put away and receiving. Track important KPIs such as inventory carrying costs, return rate, backorder rate, the stock details in the selected warehouse, and so on.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Line Chart, Gauge, Stacked Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Customer Support Analysis (Random data)
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the efficiency of customer support.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Line Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Real Estate Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Real Estate Management Dashboard helps the Real Estate Company Admins or Head to monitor their Sales Summary(Sale, Rent) on monthly basis with the important metrics such as Properties For Sale, Properties For Rent, Avg. Visits Per Sale, Avg. Days On Market, Avg. Meetings Made and Avg. calls made For Properties Sale, Properties Sold and Rented Properties By Real Estate Agent, Sales by Region-wise and Advertisement and Promotion Cost. Also, it shows the property enquiry details, Property Enquiry Referrals, and Real Estate Agent Sales Summary.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, KPI Card, Grid, Line Chart, Stacked Area Chart, Bar Chart, Pie Chart, Map

Dashboard.Name: London Olympics 2012 medals analysis
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the final medals tally for the 2012 London Olympics.
Dashboard.Tags: Label, Combo Box, Column Chart, Choropleth Map, Grid

Dashboard.Tags: Doughnut Chart, Area Chart, Card, Stacked Column Chart, List Box, Date Picker

Dashboard.Name: Property Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This property management dashboard helps the property owner or property manager to view their properties revenue details such as Net Income, Total Expense, Loss due to the vacancy. Also, you can view month-wise report for the cost you spent on the properties. The occupancy rate, tenant turnover metrics are used to learn about their business progress and needs. Based on the tenant satisfaction details, you can upgrade your business.

Dashboard.Name: Financial Management

Dashboard.Name: Online Marketing Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard contains various key metrics for an analysis of online marketing details: customer acquisition cost, visitor count, return on investment, and customer visits based on channels or sources.

Dashboard.Name: Project Overview Dashboard

Dashboard.Name: Evaluation of Energy Consumption
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard visualizes the energy consumption across various sectors for a given time period. It also shows the total power generation in various categories and the production costs for the same.

Dashboard.Name: Power Plant Monitoring
Dashboard.Description: This live monitoring dashboard shows the live production data of a power plant including total capacity, running capacity, and details of various other parameters such as ambient temperature, humidity, and frequency.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Radial Gauge, Line Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: School Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Using this school management dashboard, you can monitor important KPIs, related to attendance details of faculties and students, details about faculty, grade-wise performance, retention rate of students and faculties, faculty-to-student ratio, student enrollment details, and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Doughnut Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Student Details Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The students detail dashboard visualizes the various aspects of a student’s details that is helpful for teachers and principals. The metrics include attendance details, performance with respect to various subjects, average subject score, and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Radial Gauge, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Hotel Revenue Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows various key metrics of a hotel, including occupancy rate, marketing costs, RevPAR index, and booking sources for effective hotel management.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Area Chart, Spline Chart, Bubble Map

Dashboard.Name: Pharma Sales Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard tells the story of Rx and Non-Rx drugs Sales performance over different states via important key metrics. Compare the changes over different quarters, channels and analyze the sales and profit incurred.
Dashboard.Tags: Choropleth Map, Line chart, Card, Pie Chart, 100% Stacked Bar Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Pharma Production Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard gives an overview of important KPIs in drugs manufacturing processes like LAR, PQCR, LeadTime and the Manufacturing Cost of the drugs. Also take a view of overall production quality, drugs produced compared with its target set, over past quarters.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo box, Gauge, Area chart, Card,Stacked Column Chart, Grid, Pivot Grid

Dashboard.Name: Retail Store Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard reflects the performance of Store that Apparels. Fashion shopping experience might start in digital space but it ends in the Brick and Mortar store most of the time. The metrics and KPIs listed here helps out Store Managers and Sales managers to analyze the Key Performance Indicators that are helpful to evaluate how the store has performed in the last month. This helps to track the health of business being grown over time.
Dashboard.Tags: Choropleth Map, Spline chart, Card, Doughnut Chart, Combo Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Retail Inventory Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is about an Apparel Retail store’s inventory management. Aiming to help Inventory managers and Store managers, this dashboard shows the Key Performance Indicators that are helpful to have right product, right inventory in respective department. This dashboard also lets you track about Orders placed and Returned goods.
Dashboard.Tags: Pivot Grid, Column Chart, Heat Map, Card, Pie Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Oil and Gas Production Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: With this dashboard, you get the analysis of Oil and Gas production in BOEPD units across different wells. Values in this dashboard are represented as BOEPD (Barrels of Oil Equivalent Per Day). One barrel of Oil is equal to 159 liters of crude oil, and one barrel of Gas is equal to 5800 cubic feet of natural gas.
Dashboard.FileName: oil and gas production monitoring dashboard.sydj
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Line Chart, Stacked Column, Bar Chart, Choropleth Map

Dashboard.Name: Oil and Gas Wells Summary Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: With this dashboard, you get the complete summary of the wells managed by operator(s) from its current status, purpose the wells used, wells that are in down state and gross, net wells count over the past 6 months.
Dashboard.FileName: oil and gas wells summary dashboard.sydj
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Treemap, Grid, Column Chart, Pie Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: HR Recruitment Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is included with essential recruitment related KPIs of Human Resources (HR) department. HR admins can make use of these metrics and KPIs to improvise sourcing the best candidates for different roles. And constant monitoring helps them to cut costs and better understand factors that influence their hiring processes.
Dashboard.Tags: Grid, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Pie chart, Funnel Chart, Card

Dashboard.Name: Workforce Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is included with essential workforce related KPIs of Human Resources (HR) department. The interactive metrics present in this dashboard helps both the HR department and top-level management to know about the quality level of their employees and other crucial metrics to improve the work-quality of their organization. Additional important KPIs include Absenteeism, Gender diversity ratio, Average employee tenure and so on.
Dashboard.Tags: Grid, Card, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: Ads Campaign Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard helps monitor online marketing performance with campaigns and opportunities data.
Dashboard.Tags: Pivot Grid, Funnel Chart, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: Website Analytics Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard helps to monitor website revenue performance with the help of metrics like gross volume, bounce rate, customer churn rate, average revenue, monthly recurring revenue, lifetime value and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Gauge, Line Chart, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Release Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This Release Management Dashboard helps product managers to track the status of different product releases via metrics like release started date vs rollout date, days remaining for release, total hours worked, total completed tasks and completed story points. Also, track the tasks count and story points done by component and sprints.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, KPI Card, Grid, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Line Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Team Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This Team Management Dashboard helps project leads and managers track the team work status of each project with metrics such as total resources, overall task completion percentage, bug and feature tasks completion status, team roles, bug status, and task summary by resource, to direct the team most efficiently.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box,Number Card, KPI Card, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Gauge, Grid, Bar Chart, 100% Stacked Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Google Ads Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Google Ads Performance Dashboard helps businesses track revenue from advertisement with metrics such as impressions, number of clicks, click-through rate (CTR), cost per click (CPC), conversions, conversion rate, cost per conversion, revenue per click (RPC), new users, and sessions.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, KPI Card, Line Chart, Combo Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Construction Quality Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This construction quality management dashboard helps construction companies manage and monitor the quality of their projects including rework cost, safety meetings conducted, site inspections, types of defects, average time to fix the defects, NCR reports, net promoter score, customer satisfaction ratio (CSR), and more quality metrics.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, KPI Card, Stacked Bar Chart, Pie Chart, Gauge, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Construction Project Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Construction Project Monitoring dashboard helps construction managers monitor their project statuses for various locations with important metrics: total budget, amount of budget spent, budget variance, project work status, project stages, project duration, project details, completion percentage, actual and planned resources on each projects.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Label, KPI Card, Doughnut Chart, Pie Chart, Gauge, Column Chart, Stacked Bar Chart, Combo Chart

Dashboard.Name: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Situation Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This coronavirus disease (COVID-19) situation dashboard helps healthcare providers track the health status of each country with metrics such as confirmed cases, recovered cases, deaths by date and country, and mortality rate by date.

Dashboard.Name: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Daily Cases Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This COVID -19 Disease Daily Cases Analysis dashboard helps Hospital administrators, doctors, healthcare providers, physicians monitor health metrics such as new confirmed, recovered, and deaths over a date.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker, Combo Box, Spline Chart, Pie Chart
